name: Racing Stars
description:
Racing Stars is a single player, third person view, 3D video game that immerse the player in a journey through space. It sets the player in a little spaceship that has to wander in space as it avoids different stars and meteoroids; and if they don’t, the spaceship will crash in one of those leading to a collision with a star such as it happens in outer space once a satellite losses orbits and collide with mater as well.

The goal of the game is to involve the player in a journey through space in order to avoid as many collisions as possible.
